email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. Given the current market, $50.75 is quite competitive, but I can offer $49.50 per ton to meet you halfway. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.50 is closer to our target. However, we’d like to finalize at $48.00 per ton. Also, can we extend the laycan to October 15-22 to allow for some flexibility? Let me know if this is feasible. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed your counteroffer with the owner, and we can agree to $48.50 per ton. The laycan can be adjusted to October 15-22 as requested. Please confirm if this works, and I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 per ton works for us. Please proceed with drafting the agreement, and send it over for review. Thanks for your flexibility on the laycan. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll have the draft agreement sent to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to finalizing this deal. Best, Sarah
